name: Echoed World
description:
feedback. Most members of our team had no previous experience with game development and Echoed World was made during a few months of tutored game development classes. Our main goal is to show, what can be achieved with a group of talented, yet inexperienced people in a relatively short amount of time.

We hope that you will enjoy this short, yet sweet adventure.
All the feedback we get on Echoed World will push our team even further!
